artist: Engraver: Jan Galle; Artist: Maarten van Heemskerk
description: Mars in charriot at top; battleground below includes soldiers and peasants fighting; cannon at right middle ground; city beyond; tents at right middle ground; crab and ram in sky to right of mars
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in plate in black: [ MARS/ M. Heemskerck in./  Joan Galle excud./ .5. two lines in Latin:  Mars facit...tirannos.] in pencil on sheet: [1-443]
title: Mars
